events.name: Web Startup Group Inaugural Winter Meeting
events.about:
Start your own Web Startup 

Join us for our first monthly hackathon for technology students (any major, any skill level) at 6pm on January 17thin 1170 of the Talmage Building. 

The Web Startup Group will be conducting monthly meetings for technology students that are interested in the startup world.  WSG members will be creating technology oriented products in order to gain experience in cultivating a startup idea, building a product with a minimum feature set, and gaining an initial user base. The WSG is open to all majors and skill levels.

Web Startup Group

Build. Measure. Learn.
